raw_comment: I noticed that young woman reached out to their parents more than young men. I wonder if this trend is caused due to woman wanting to continue the relationship with them and if it’s “uncool” for men to reach out. This relates to my community because i’ve seen many woman come back and spend time with their family’s. What is the reason for men being less active with their parents?
ace_sentences: I noticed that young women reach out to their parents more than young men.
I wonder if this trend is caused by women who want to continue the relationship with their parents.
I wonder if it is uncool for men to reach out to their parents.
This trend relates to my community.
In my community, I have seen many women come back and spend time with their families.
I ask what the reason is that men are less active with their parents.
